title: Ezekiel Elliott, NFL Contracts, Mike Daniels and L.A.’s Ambassador Magic Johnson
itunes:title: Ezekiel Elliott, NFL Contracts, Mike Daniels and L.A.’s Ambassador Magic Johnson
description:
On today's episode of The Herd, Colin challenges the Cowboys on whether or not they are willing to accept every aspect of Ezekiel Elliott and explains how the Packers took a page out of the Patriots playbook by cutting DE Mike Daniels. Colin discusses the leverage that Melvin Gordon has over the Chargers and why Magic Johnson couldn’t land Kawhi Leonard. Nick Wright stops by to weigh in on his conversation with Odell Beckham Jr regarding his profound answers in an interview with GQ. Plus, LaVar Arrington on the difficulty of paying players in the NFL and Jane Slater on Ezekiel Elliott’s future with the Cowboys! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
